page.title: 09My Family's Sunday
page.content: My father goes to work at 6.30 a.m. gets home at 1.00 p.m., has dinner then goes to bed until 5.00 p.m. Later he visits my nan. At about 7.00 p.m. he comes home, has supper then watches T.V. before going to bed. My mother gets up at 10.00 a.m., prepares dinner, goes shopping then cooks the dinner. After dinner she does her washing and housework sometimes she makes tart for tea. After tea she sometimes goes down the garden. Later she has a bath, watches T.V. then goes to bed. I get up at 9.00 a.m. and my sister an hour or so later. We play until dinner time or watch T.V. and do the same after dinner until tea. Later we have supper, bath, watch T.V. for a hour or so then go to bed.
